meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Mitchell Kelleher Amy Finkelstein Maryann Penzvalto Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7707.

td.p: Paul Mitchell Kelleher, a physician from Millington, New Jersey
Amy Finkelstein, an editor from Chicago, Illinois
Maryann Penzvalto, a librarian from Cleveland, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,801)

tr.td: OTHER WONDER WOMEN
A FRENCH PREPOSITION
FUEL FOSSILS
"X" IN THE CITY
ZERO
TOLERANCE

tr.td: Back on the doomed planet of Krypton, she was known as Kara Zor-El

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Maryann
Amy
Paul
GIVING YOU THE EARTH & THE MOON
RATING SYSTEMS
THE FEDERALIST PAPERS
TV SPIN-OFFS
(Alex: We'll give you the TV spin-off, you name the source show.)
LITERARY HOMES
HOW ARE "THINGS"?

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: There\'s a bit of a trap in this clue. The date was very important.)
...
(Alex: [To Paul] That\'s when it was built, and they were writing about it at that time.)
PaulWhat is the Empire State Building
$4,300
AmyWhat is the Statue of Liberty?
$6,300
MaryannWhat is the Empire State Building
$3,201
the Empire State Building')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
